label: none
description: No surgical diagnostic or staging procedure was performed.

label: biopsy of site other than primary, no exploratory
description: A biopsy (incisional, needle, or aspiration) was done to a site other than the primary site. No exploratory procedure was done.

label: biopsy of primary site or lymph node
description: A biopsy (incisional, needle, or aspiration) was done of the primary site or biopsy of a lymph node was done to diagnose or stage lymphoma.

label: exploratory only
description: A surgical exploration only. The patient was not biopsied or treated during the procedure.

label: bypass, no biopsy
description: A surgical procedure with a bypass was performed, but no biopsy was done.

label: exploratory and biopsy
description: An exploratory procedure was performed, and a biopsy of either the primary site or another site was done.

label: bypass and biopsy
description: A bypass procedure was performed, and a biopsy of either the primary site or another site was done.

label: procedure, NOS
description: A procedure was done, but the type of procedure is unknown.
